attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Everyone uses the footpaths and crosses the road which is incorporated in the highway code.  
New residents to this country, & road user that have passed their test more than 5 yrs previous will not have read nor updated their code knowledge.  From the basic road/path user to the highest level of driver WE should be trained to use the paths/roads etc then issued an ID card/Road user licence.

Then checked every 7 years for safe use of the area that the licence is held for. i.e. pedestrian =path. Bus driver =bus lane, road & path. Car driver road/path.

The initial driving test will be more comprehensive to include 2 hours with vehicles not required by the applicant to show how OTHER road users require road space i.e. a car driver will watch from a safety car how a motorcyclist/LGV requires road space, & vice versa.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
